entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
